Section.Catchline: Powers and duties of the department.

SectionBody.Text: The department shall have the power and duty to:

Subsection.Text: Contract with local governments as needed to perform any of its duties under ss. 376.320-376.326.
Establish a program to register tanks subject to the provisions of ss. 376.320-376.326.
Enforce the provisions of ss. 376.320-376.326 pursuant to the provisions of ss. 403.121 and 403.161.
Require that facilities covered by ss. 376.320-376.326 be subject to thorough and complete inspections at reasonable times. The provisions of s. 403.091 shall apply to such inspections.
